title: Does Matlab have any specific attendance?
content: I have missed quite a few matlab classes...

comments.body: attendance is included in math so if you miss matlab you'll be losing math attendance
Also , oh boy , please study matlab , I took it lightly and lost one whole grade in math
Damn, thanks for the advice. However they don't teach anything, they just ask us to type out whatever is in the slides. Such a waste of time
Oh boy , half of pesu is a waste of time. Sadly , no choice other than getting used to it.
